targets.query: SELECT (last("memoryQuota") * last("runningInstance" )) FROM "bluemix_app_info" WHERE "center" =~ /^$dc$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "space" =~ /^$space$/ AND "app" =~ /^$app$/ AND $timeFilter

list.label: 조직(ORG)
list.name: org
list.query: show tag values with key = "org"  where center =~ /$dc/

list.label: 영역(SPACE)
list.name: space
list.query: show tag values with key = "space" where dc=$dc and org=$org

list.label: 앱
list.name: app
list.query: show tag values with key = "app" where center = $dc and org= $org and space =~ /$space/

list.label: 셀(CELL)
list.name: cell
list.query: show tag values with key = "host" where center = $dc and org= $org and space =~ /$space/ and app =~ /$app/
